Content.Text:
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome!
<PAGE>
You're that new farmer <MYNAME>, right? I'm
<BLUE>Corona</BLUE>. I work the counter at the Carpenter's
Shop.
<PAGE>
You can buy materials from us to build a lot of
useful things for your house and farm.
<PAGE>
Now, my hubby Gunther's the carpenter here,
but he's useless behind a counter, so if you need
our services, come see me, 'kay?
<PAGE>
Talk to me at the counter during business hours
and I'll show you what we've got for sale.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>! Welcome!
<PAGE>
This is my home. We sell all the materials you'll
need for tackling that next big construction
project.
<PAGE>
With the stuff you can get from us, you can
build a lot of useful things for your house or
farm.
<PAGE>
Now, my hubby Gunther's the carpenter here,
but he's useless behind a counter, so if you need
our services, come see me, 'kay?
<PAGE>
Talk to me at the counter during business hours
and I'll show you what we've got for sale.
